name: You are the level
description:
This is "You are the level", my entry for the MiniJam 93 made in 2h15 with Unity.

CONTROLS

Left Mouse Click: Drag and Drop blocks

You can't control the player. The goal is to change the level to help the player go as high as possible. But be careful, there might be dangerous things along the way!

How high can you reach?

HOW I MADE THE GAME
